Nil for studies in India1% of loan amount for studies abroad (Max: Rs. 10,000)
Nil for studies in India1% of loan amount for studies abroad (Max: Rs. 10,000)

Up to 1.5% of the loan amount
Nil for studies in India1% of the loan amount (Maximum: Rs.5,000) for studies abroad
No processing for charges up to Rs.7.50 lakh1% of loan amount up to Rs.10,000 for loan above Rs. 7.50 lakh
No processing fee for studies in India
Maximum up to 1% of the loan amount
1% of the sanctioned loan amount above Rs. 7.50 lakh for studies abroad

Eligibility Criteria: Loans are provided for sanctioned undergraduate programs, postgraduate programs, PhDs, diploma courses with a duration of six months or more, job-oriented courses, and technical/professional courses
Applicants must be enrolled or secure admissions in recognised institutions, government institutions, professional institutions, and international colleges and universities
For undergraduate courses, applicants should have completed 10+2 (12th standard), and for postgraduate courses, a degree is required
